metadata.title: CVE-2017-11113 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.description: In ncurses 6.0, there is a NULL Pointer Dereference in the _nc_parse_entry function of tinfo/parse_entry.c. It could lead to a remote denial of service attack if the terminfo library code is used to process untrusted terminfo data.

criterions.comment: ncurses package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.1-1ubuntu1').
